trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_SEQ_01<tab>Cibleroit has a hunger for nanka eggs, and you must help him sate it. Harvest five eggs from a ninki nanka in the nearby river and bring them to him.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_SEQ_02<tab>You have gathered the sticky, slimy nankaspawn. Get it off your hands as quickly as possible by delivering it to Cibleroit.

TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_SEQ_03<tab>Cibleroit is delighted to receive the eggs. The Hungerer, however, thinks they are disgusting. Unlike the Gnath of the Onemind, differences of opinion─and all they entail─seem to be a unique characteristic of the Nonmind.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_TODO_00<tab>Slay a ninki nanka and obtain its eggs.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_CIBLEROIT_000_000<tab>Generous hunter, we would like to ask something of you. It is not difficult work.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_CIBLEROIT_000_001<tab>We need nanka eggs. Five delicious nanka eggs. <click> <click> Slay a ninki nanka and harvest its delicious eggs for us.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_CIBLEROIT_000_010<tab>Do you have the eggs? Five succulent nanka eggs?
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_UMASOU_000_002<tab>We wonder, will you never tire of nanka eggs, Cibleroit?
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_CIBLEROIT_000_030<tab>Do you have the nanka eggs? <click> <click> Tasty, juicy nanka eggs... <click> <click> <click>
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_CIBLEROIT_000_031<tab><click> <click> Yesss. Thank you for these eggs. The texture is irresistible. We could eat a thousand of them...but five will do for now.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_UMASOU_000_032<tab>We cannot understand your liking for nanka eggs. They are disgusting. <click> <click> You have bad taste.
TEXT_HEAVNZ217_01786_CIBLEROIT_000_033<tab>We cannot understand your dislike for nanka eggs. But this is what it means to be of the Nonmind.
